theFrontline:Deterrent.NAME: Deterrent
theFrontline:Deterrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage if the target is above half HP.

theFrontline:CounterPace.NAME: Counter Pace
theFrontline:CounterPace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the target intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

theFrontline:Bushwack.NAME: Bushwack
theFrontline:Bushwack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thefrontline:Flanking: Deal !D! damage again.

theFrontline:StoicFront.NAME: Stoic Front
theFrontline:StoicFront.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take damage this turn, gain that much thefrontline:Grace.

theFrontline:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
theFrontline:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage modifiers affect this card twice. NL Exhaust.

theFrontline:PickOff.NAME: Pick Off
theFrontline:PickOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, reduce this card's cost by !M! this combat.

theFrontline:OneShot.NAME: One Shot
theFrontline:OneShot.DESCRIPTION: This character's next attack deals double damage. NL Exhaust.

theFrontline:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
theFrontline:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 random card. NL Decrease its cost by !M! until played.
theFrontline:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Decrease its cost by !M! until played.

theFrontline:Suppression.NAME: Suppression
theFrontline:Suppression.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next time the target attacks, it takes !D! damage.

theFrontline:Shredder.NAME: Shredder
theFrontline:Shredder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if the enemy has Block.

theFrontline:SprayNPray.NAME: Spray 'n Pray
theFrontline:SprayNPray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to a random enemy !M! times.

theFrontline:SmallSweep.NAME: Small Sweep
theFrontline:SmallSweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, heal !M! HP.

theFrontline:Dauerfeuer.NAME: Dauerfeuer
theFrontline:Dauerfeuer.DESCRIPTION: Play all attacks in your hand at no cost and half damage. NL Exhaust.

theFrontline:StumblingShot.NAME: Stumbling Shot
theFrontline:StumblingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Affected by thefrontline:Grace.

theFrontline:LikeOnTV.NAME: Like on TV!
theFrontline:LikeOnTV.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Gold and raise your Max HP by !theFrontline:M2!.

theFrontline:ProtectionPrayer.NAME: Protection Prayer
theFrontline:ProtectionPrayer.DESCRIPTION: Gain 25% more Block for !theFrontline:M2! turns. NL thesacred:Aligned: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
